General.Name: Budapesti Ingatlan Hasznositasi es Fejlesztesi Nyrt.
General.Description: Budapesti Ingatlan Hasznosítási és Fejlesztési Nyrt. engages in the property development business in Hungary. The company engages in the construction of offices, building plots, and residential properties; development of land into plots; and renting out properties. It operates parking garages and hotel. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Budapest, Hungary. Budapesti Ingatlan Hasznosítási és Fejlesztési Nyrt. is a subsidiary of PIÓ 21 Kft.
